title: Flipped Learning-Based Advanced Chinese Native Language Proficiency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Mandarin proficiency at HSK Level 5 or above and basic linguistic knowledge
context.additional_context: Real-life scenario-based learning in VR environments and pre-learning materials utilizing digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can appropriately utilize advanced Chinese expressions (pragmatics) in context with over 80% accuracy through VR simulations.
In a flipped learning environment, learners achieve over 90% participation in pre-learning (videos/quizzes) and enhance self-directed learning abilities.
By scoring above 85 in summative assessments, learners demonstrate advanced language proficiency in business and academic contexts.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
